explains: v. 熄灭；消灭，使破灭；<法律>取消（权利，义务），使无效；偿清；压制

sentences.en: The firemen did their best to extinguish the fire.
sentences.cn: 消防队员竭尽全力灭火。

sentences.en: However many generations succeed us in coming centuries, none of them will ever see this species that we extinguish.
sentences.cn: 无论多少代人在未来几个世纪里接替我们，他们谁也不会看到我们消灭的这个物种。

sentences.en: Firefighters tried to extinguish the flames.
